metadata.title: CVE-2017-12475 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The AP4_Processor::Process function in Core/Ap4Processor.cpp in Bento4mp4encrypt before 1.5.0-616 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted mp4file.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
